## Zone.(constructor)

Represents a rectangular region on the table, with an outline and optional label.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(width?: number, height?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | _(Optional)_ Width of the zone in centimeters. |
|  height | number | _(Optional)_ Height of the zone in centimeters. |
